title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5316.15 - Transaction limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5316.15 - Transaction limits

State Regulations

Each kiosk shall be able to have transaction limits for
issuance and for voucher redemption, where applicable. The configuration of the
transaction limit shall be via a secure means. The transaction limit shall
conform to the reporting thresholds for winnings established by the United

States Internal Revenue Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5316.15

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
